verbs.description: [ARG0: rockets] gm seems to [V: throw] [ARG1: shade] [ARG2: at rajon rondo houston rockets] general manager daryl morey has heard what los angeles lakers guard rajon rondo said about chris paul he has has now made his feelings known about said take in the fallout of the nasty brawl between the two teams rondo trashed paul telling espn that he a bad teammate morey responded to rondo not with words but with a picture pic twitter com edyjirwqfo rob pelinka magic johnson espn rajon rondo morey houston rockets gm los angeles lakers rockets band chris paul general manager morey rockets los angeles daryl morey
